about_the_game:
A deluxe support item pack for your Onigiri adventure! Get useful items at a discount and a limited accessory!

Contents
- Onigiri Coins: 500OC
- Soul Egg x50
- Gold Kompeitou x50
- EXP Boost +300% (60Min.) x3
- Ryou Boost +300% (60Min.) x3
- Drop Boost +300% (60Min.) x3
- Smelting Amulet Transcendent Fortune x3
- Oranmentation Amulet Transcendent Fortune x3
- Gacha Ticket x10
- Character Exchange Ticket -Premium Support Pack- x1
- Accessory Jounin's Wrap Hiei x1

Only one pack may be purchased per account.
Onigiri Coins are required to obtain certain in-game contents.

Using the Vanguard Basket -Premium Support Pack- will grant a Summoner's Scroll for one of the following characters of your choice:

Miyamoto Musashi
Dark Miyamoto Musashi
Sarutobi Sasuke
Himiko
Izuna Tri-Tail
Sakata Kintoki
Shuten-Douji
Oda Nobunaga
Lancelot
Uesugi Kenshin
Takeda Shingen
Gawain
Toyotomi Hideyoshi
Shibata Katsuie
Koujirou (Flying Swallow)
Ono no Komachi
Tristan
Sanzou
Android Six
Android Ninety-Nine

content_descriptors.notes: note: Includes violent expressions and highly exposed clothing.

name: Onigiri Premium Support Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 10 32bit・64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 7800GT, AMD RADEON HD2900XT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card (DirectX 9.0c and above)

short_description: A luxurious item support pack for your adventure in the free-to-play MMO RPG Onigiri! Item pack includes many rare items, a limited Accessory, and a support character of your choice!
